name: Grav-Jump
description:
This is a momentum based platformer. You use your abilities to make it to the top but be careful. If you waste your batteries you wont have enough left over to complete your job. 

Controls are Left click to boost

Space to jump

A and D to move left to right

Assets Used

https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-industrial-tileset

https://opengameart.org/content/industrial-parallax-background
